div.p: This element belongs conceptually within WRITING PRODUCTION . Though, it can equally be used within TEXTUALFEATURES or RECEPTION. It is meant to identify named literary or artistic schools that influenced an authorâ€™s writing or in which she was a participant or at least with which she had significant contact. Make sure to capture the name of the school within the tag. Writers/taggers exercise own judgement about whether some aesthetic idea or belief constitutes a literary school or not.

div.p: If the woman writer was affiliated with a political school of thought, that information belongs within POLITICS in BIBLIOGRAPHY.
Question: She was considered a socialist writer. Do I tag that as a literary school?
Answer: No, that belongs in a discussion of her political affiliation.
